result.title: problem from the uri
result.content:
this code has 40% wrong and i think there is alot if mistakes in it so please help me this is the problem https://www.urionlinejudge.com.br/judge/en/problems/view/1040 and this is my C++ code

#include <iostream>
     #include <cstdio>
     using namespace std;
     double N1,N2,N3,N4;
     double Average1,Average2;
     double Score;

   int main()
   {
   cin >> N1 >> N2 >> N3 >> N4;
   cin >> Score;
   Average1 = ((2*N1)+(3*N2)+(4*N3)+(1*N4))/10.0;
   cout <<"Media: ";
   printf ("%.1lf\n",Average1);

if (Average1 >= 7.0)
cout <<"Aluno aprovado.\n";
else if (Average1 < 5.0)
cout <<"Aluno reprovado.\n";
else if (5.0 < Average1 && Average1 < 6.9)
cout <<"Aluno em exame.\n";
printf ("Nota do exame: %.1lf",Score);

Average2 = (Score+Average1)/2.0;
if (Average2 >= 5.0)
{
cout <<"\nAluno aprovado.\n";
 }
else if
(Average2 <= 4.9)
cout <<"Aluno reprovado.";

cout <<"\nMedia final: ";
printf ("%.1lf",Average2);
cout <<endl;
return 0;   
}
